root.name: Jack the Ripper
root.description: In Jack the Ripper: players take the role of the green reporter, James Palmer, assigned to cover a series of gruesome murder in the seedy side of New York, 1901. The signs point to this spree being a return of infamous Jack the Ripper murders that took place in London, 1888. Yet, any doubt is put to rest and the real adventure begins when James finds he's attracted the personal interest of Jack himself!

similar_games.game: Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper
